article.headline: Brigham Young 72, Oral Roberts 62
article.story: PROVO, Utah (AP)-- Keena Young's 21 points and 16 rebounds led Brigham Young to a 72-62 victory over Oral Roberts Friday night in the BYU Holiday Classic. The Cougars held Oral Roberts to two free throws in the final 2:46 while scoring eight to seal the win. BYU (9-4) struggled during the first five minutes of each half as it was outscored by Oral Roberts (6-7) 12-4 in the first half and 16-2 in the second. But the Cougars responded with a 14-0 run in the first and a 16-3 run in the second. Oral Roberts' second half run was sparked by eight of Ken Tutt's 24 points and gave the Golden Eagles a 10 point lead at 39-49 with 15:08 remaining. Young scored nine consecutive points for the Cougars during their 16-2 run, including a basket with 9:57 remaining that gave BYU its first lead since the first minute of the second half. Caleb Green was controlling the inside game for the Golden Eagles' with 21 points and 13 rebounds, but he only played 11 minutes in the second half before fouling out with 4:39 remaining. BYU dominated the rebounding battle with a 53-30 advantage, including 19 on the offensive boards. Trent Plaisted and Lee Cummard had 11 and nine rebounds, respectively. The win pushes BYU's home winning streak to 22 games. Friday was the second day of the three-day round-robin tournament hosted by Brigham Young in Provo, Utah.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
